name: Without You (itch)
description:
Name:  Without You

You are a student who tried to take advantage of all his opportunities to get a girlfriend and failed disastrously, and now it depends on your decisions that this last year of school is wiil be different.

Platforms: PC / Android

Note:
Hello, we are Ukumari GDC. An independent development studio founded about 2 months ago and we want to tell you that this game is currently developed until the middle of chapter 1, we promise to upload an update with chapter 1 finished approximately on March 15th.

Our long-term goals:

  • Five or six complete original chapters.
  • Approximately between 10 - 12 finals (good - bad - harem endings).
  • Original art (characters, backgrounds, etc).
  • Original music and sound effects.
  • Development of the game's website where updates of the game will be constantly published.
  • Channel of discord for the community.

We are very excited about your comments and that you can support our project.
Thank you very much for playing it!

Team:
